name: BiomechanicalLesionsnotElsewhereClassified
title: Biomechanical Lesions (not Elsewhere Classified)
description: This value set is used to calculate OP-8 (MRI Lumbar Spine for Low Back Pain), a claims-based measure used in the Centers for Medicare & Medicaid Services' Hospital Outpatient Quality Reporting (HOQR) Program. In calculation of OP-8, diagnoses of biomechanical lesions not classified using an alternative diagnostic code (or other low back pain diagnosis) must appear on the MRI study claim to be eligible for inclusion in the measure's initial patient population.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains ICD-10 codes for biomechanical lesions not captured by an alternative diagnostic code.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a diagnosis of biomechanical lesions.),(Inclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes for biomechanical lesions are included in this value set.),(Exclusion Criteria: ICD-10 codes not associated with diagnoses of biomechanical lesions are excluded from this value set. Terminologies other than ICD-10 are also excluded from this value set.)
